name: stake
attributes: # [doc = " ユーザーがステーキング用アカウントを作成し、指定量を預け入れ"]
body: require ! (ctx . accounts . user . is_signer , ErrorCode :: Unauthorized) ;

let cpi_ctx = CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . system_program . to_account_info () , anchor_lang :: system_program :: Transfer { from : ctx . accounts . user . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . stake_rec . to_account_info () , } ,) ;
let rec = & mut ctx . accounts . stake_rec ;
rec . user = ctx . accounts . user . key () ;
rec . amount = rec . amount . checked_add (amount) . unwrap () ;
msg ! ("Staked {} lamports for {}" , amount , rec . user) ;

name: unstake
attributes: # [doc = " ユーザーがステーキングを解除し、全額を払い戻し"]
body: require ! (ctx . accounts . user . is_signer , ErrorCode :: Unauthorized) ;
let rec = & mut ctx . accounts . stake_rec ;

let cpi_ctx = CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . system_program . to_account_info () , anchor_lang :: system_program :: Transfer { from : ctx . accounts . stake_rec . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . user . to_account_info () , } ,) ;
msg ! ("Unstaked {} lamports for {}" , amount , rec . user) ;
